product_name: The North Face Passing Through Beanie
long_description: The North Face Passing Through beanie has 360deg reflectivity to keep you visible to motorists while you're out for a jog on a chilly evening. Polyester/elastane fabric has a soft hand and it stretches to fit comfortably. Wind-blocking front panel staves off brain freezes. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. The North Face Passing Through beanie has a hidden ponytail port to accommodate long hair.
short_description: The North Face Passing Through beanie has 360deg reflectivity to keep you visible to motorists while you're out for a jog on a chilly evening.
